Title: 3. News Media
Write-Up Text: In the past few hours people took to the internet to share some of the hottest news and trends. Here's what's buzzing: with calls for a boost in JobSeeker payments and the Australian share market taking a hit the federal government has a lot on its plate. And while the Reserve Bank of New Zealand faces a heated debate on its monetary policies we also learned of a major rescue operation to save fishermen stranded off WA's coast. Stay tuned for updates folks!
